blogPost.excerpt: Make your videos accessible to a global audience by automatically translating your video online. Expand your reach by creating content in multiple languages, to be viewed by people from all over the globe.
blogPost.body: Make your videos accessible to a global audience by automatically translating your video online. Expand your reach by creating content in multiple languages, to be viewed by people from all over the globe.
blogPost.title: Translate Video - Auto translate your video into different languages online
blogPost.author: Ben Lang

localize.description: 通过在线自动翻译您的视频，让全球观众都能看到您的视频。通过创建多种语言的内容，扩大您的影响力，让全球各地的人都能看到。
localize.tagline: 自动将您的视频翻译成不同的语言在线

localize.description: 通過在線自動翻譯您的視頻，讓全球觀衆都能看到您的視頻。通過創建多種語言的內容，擴大您的影響力，讓全球各地的人都能看到。
localize.tagline: 自動將您的視頻翻譯成不同的語言在線

previous.excerpt: Corrily optimizes prices and discounts for subscription and usage-based companies. By copying a few lines of code, you can run experiments to find better prices, localize them to the user, and boost growth and retention.
previous.title: Corrily - Price localization and optimization for SaaS companies

localize.description: Corrily为订阅和使用型公司优化价格和折扣。通过复制几行代码，你可以运行实验来寻找更好的价格，将其本地化到用户，并促进增长和保留。
localize.tagline: SaaS企业的价格本地化和优化

localize.description: Corrily爲訂閱和使用型公司優化價格和折扣。通過複製幾行代碼，你可以運行實驗來尋找更好的價格，將其本地化到用戶，並促進增長和保留。
localize.tagline: SaaS企業的價格本地化和優化

next.excerpt: A free desktop app that sits in your menu bar: — select services you depend on — check their status in your menu bar — get notified when they change their status
next.title: Instatus Out - Monitor services in your menu bar

localize.description: 一个免费的桌面应用程序，位于您的菜单栏： - 选择您所依赖的服务 - 在您的菜单栏中查看他们的状态 - 当他们改变状态时得到通知。
一個免費的桌面應用程序，位於您的菜單欄： - 選擇您所依賴的服務 - 在您的菜單欄中查看他們的狀態 - 當他們改變狀態時得到通知。
